mapper.sql: ID, NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, PHONE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, PHONE) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET NAME = #{name}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, GENDER = #{gender}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE id = #{id}
